channel.title: Experiences on Maz Yafai
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Maz Yafai

item.title: Researcher and Lecturer @ University of East London
item.description: Conduct research on cutting-edge topics in Artificial Intelligence and Big Data Technologies, focusing on areas such as compound flood risk modeling and multimodal models for Alzheimer’s classification. Develop and deliver lectures for Big Data Technologies courses, covering advanced concepts in Spark, Hadoop, Azure, and data engineering techniques for undergraduate and postgraduate students. Collaborate with senior faculty to design and implement comprehensive curricula for courses including MERN stack development, Hadoop administration, Spark ML, and HiveQL, tailored for Level 5 and Level 7 students.

item.title: Software Developer @ Hudas Technologies
item.description: Developed a CRM primarily in React and Python Django. Improved customer experience by 30%(over 10000 customers) by implementing the CRM. All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production

item.title: Software Developer @ PES College
item.description: Developed a CRM primarily in React and Python Django. Improved customer experience by 30%(over 10000 customers) by implementing the CRM. All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production
